message.name: INTERNAL_ERROR
message.text: The system encountered an unexpected condition, or contains a software bug. Details: {TECHNICAL_DESCRIPTION}.
message.solution: Review the log file to determine the problem that led to the error condition.

message.name: ARGUMENT_MALFORMED
message.text: The given argument is at least partly malformed. Argument ''{ARGUMENT_NAME}'' cannot be set to value ''{Serializable:ARGUMENT_VALUE}''. Detailed description: {HINT}.
message.solution: Supply a correct value for the argument.

message.name: ASSERTION_FAILED
message.text: Assertion failed. A condition in the programme is tested and found to be false. Message: {MESSAGE}.

message.name: INCONSISTENT_DATABASE
message.text: A value read from the database was invalid. The database value {Serializable:ARGUMENT_VALUE} of column {COLUMN} in table {TABLE} could not be converted into the java type {TYPE}. Possibly the database has been modified manually, or the software that wrote the database contains a bug.
message.solution: Correct the value in the database if modified manually.

message.name: REMOTE_CALL_FAILURE
message.text: The call to a internal remote object failed.
message.solution: Review the log file to determine the problem that led to the error condition.

message.name: DATABASE_INTEGRITY_ERROR
message.text: While accessing table {TABLE}, the following problem was encountered: {PROBLEM}.
message.solution: Review the log file to determine the problem that led to the error condition.

message.name: DATABASE_ACCESS_FAILED
message.text: The system encountered an exception while accessing a database.
message.solution: Review the log file to determine the problem that led to the error condition.
